Articles.Content:
Hi, my son has had KSP for a while and we just got a new windows 10 laptop(it came with win 10), 16GB RAM and 1TB hard drive and as of a few days ago the game crashes. I uninstalled and reinstalled and it just crashed again.During the most recent crash he was in the space plane hanger building. Any ideas would be much appreciated

 

Terry
Hi there. Try updating the graphics card driver to the latest version.  Ive seen this problem before with Win 10 and this has fixed the issue before. Let us know if it works
Unfortunately KSP can crash, but if this has suddenly gotten worse please take a look here as we'll need some more info.
